text: what is your vacuum cleaner tell you
about the european union right take a
look at this it exists because of the EU
and it tells you how much energy a load
of different products use now two years
ago the EU brought in new rules designed
to make vacuum cleaners more energy
efficient those rules reduced the amount
of power that a vacuum cleaner was
allowed to use but they increase the
amount of dust that it had to be able to
pick up why do this it's about the
environment what the European Union
wants to do is to increase energy
efficiency by 20% by 2020 in order to
cut down on the amount of energy that we
use it's been doing this for years on a
range of domestic electrical products
and more could follow now some say
Brussels is meddling in our daily lives
with all this but others argue it's
simply for the collective good and over
the years these measures have been
